```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

1. Move all files to merge into working directory
2. Define files as the list of all files in working directory and loop them all into a data frame

```{r}
files <- list.files(here(data)) #Creates a vector of all file names
maxN_data <- data.frame(her) #Create empty data frame
for (file in files){
  print(file)
  df <- read.delim(file, header = TRUE, sep = "\t", dec = ".", skip = 4)
  maxN_data <- rbind.fill(maxN_data, df)
}
```
